Summary: This is 3rd night in row. Was outside looking at sky, thought saw shooting start. Then again - only they didn't fall. I noted 2 triangles form after they wre in circle. they move like shooting star and don't fall. see clouds behind them & no moon
divs: sighting detailsi was outside looking out at the sky, really nice evening. i noticed right away that there were more stars out than usual and brighter! i saw what i thought was 2 shooting stars, red flashing like. but the stars didn't fall. so i kept watching! first there was like 8, then about 12-14 of these "stars". they formed 2 triangles - again the white sparkle lights, there was one large one and one big one. they were just stationary most of the time, but once they did form a circle. a while later i noted them go into the triangle. but there were a few that were just to the side. not in triangle. flashing stars\flairs, red! i have seen this three nights in a row! they were still out there 20 minutes ago! they see to come about 9 pm and hoover till midnight, tonight it's 1 am! it looks like a fleet. you can see them flash, sometimes fall a straight line, like a shooting start - red flare. they flash in and out - then come back. so i guess i had a couple things going on! i just went outside because it was nice out - i've never seen anything like this! honestly it gave me a panic attack tonight! they are intamidating looking!!!!! how can i see the clouds behind them when there is no moon out and it's dark. the stars are in one area only - same spot the last 3 nights. no other "stars" around! clear, and we don't get that many stars at my area of the city. plus i looked later on and they are all gone! right now they are still here. i have seen them form a circle. then triangle. some just kind of flash or act like shooting stars. i'm not sure what is going on but 3 nights in a row and they do not act like stars. i a m kind of freaked out!!! i've not seen this before. but everyone else sees them less time - i have seen them one hour last night, going on 3 tonight and about 2 1\2 the night before! why are they staying here so long????? advice? i'm scared!
